abstract: Microsoft, bypassing corporate distaste for growing marijuana industry, is unveiling partnership with start-up Kind to offer software that tracks plants from 'seed to sale'; technology will aim to help states that permit drug to monitor sales and commerce; venture represents start of legitimate infrastructure for marijuana industry.
lead_paragraph: As the marijuana industry grows inexorably more mainstream, an established company moves to enter the government compliance side of the business.

headline.main: The First Big Company to Say It’s Serving the Legal Marijuana Trade? Microsoft.
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Dips Toe Into Trade on Marijuana

snippet: As the marijuana industry grows inexorably more mainstream, an established company moves to enter the government compliance side of the business.
